name: Furry Arena [18+]
description:
Furry arena is a first-person shooter arena in the style of sci-fi. The game contains elements of sexual content. You play as a female protagonist. You can play both single player and multiplayer with other players. Playing in Furry arena you can earn points, which can then be exchanged for screenshots, as well as scenes of a sexual nature

Features
Attractive female protagonist
Ability to play with other people
Battle other players in solo and team multiplayer tournaments
Variety of interactive sex scenes
Hot scenes with main protagonist
